headline: Assessing Salesforce (CRM) Valuation As AI Partnerships Expand And Analyst Support Builds Ahead Of Earnings
summary: Renewed attention on Salesforce (CRM) is being driven by fresh analyst support for its AI roadmap and an expanded collaboration with Asymbl on workforce orchestration. Investors are also looking ahead to the upcoming earnings release. See our latest analysis for Salesforce. Despite the AI-focused contracts, acquisitions and job cuts, Salesforce’s 30 day share price return of 18.85% and year to date share price return of 27.34% decline point to fading momentum.
